author: Tim Marcin
title: BBC weatherman kills the channel's theme song on drums after delivering the forecast
description: The BBC's Owain Wyn Evans took working from home to an entirely new level. The Welsh weatherman for the BBC tweeted out a video where he covered the BBC News theme song immediately after wrapping up the forecast on the drums. And he absolutely killed it. "Whe…
content:
The BBC's Owain Wyn Evans took working from home to an entirely new level. 
The Welsh weatherman for the BBC tweeted out a video where he covered the BBC News theme song immediately after wrapping up the forecast on the drums. And he absolutely killed it.
